song_lyrics: Is tan dhankī kaun baḍāī, dekhat nainome miṭṭī milāī °ṭek
Apne khātir mahal banāyā, āp hī jā kar jangal soyā ° 1
Hāḍ jale jaise lakaḍīkīmaulī,†bāl jale jaise ghāsakī polī ° 2
Kahat Kabīrā suno mere guniyā, āp mūe pīchhe ḍūb gaī duniyā ° 3
title: Is tan dhankī kaun baḍāī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-590: Kabirdas

Category: Updeshna Pad

Raag(s): Kãfi
